ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Why did you start a Bard (long winded look at t he good old da ys)
ygData.msgSnippet: There is nothing more ponderous than a High Elf cleric in full bronze...except maybe a bard with broken drums... Ponderous...ponderous... Ever have a word, you
ygData.messageBody:
There is nothing more ponderous than a High Elf cleric in full
bronze...except maybe a bard with broken drums...

Ponderous...ponderous...

Ever have a word, you know you have right, but it just looks weird?

Heh..anyway..it's early.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:06 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Why did you start a Bard (long winded look at
the good old da ys)


High elves really make the best clerics, with your high wisdom, you will be
able to concentrate on ac and +mana items. Your only problem will be your
low str will sometimes be annoying.


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
